Module com.example.pingpong
Package com.example.pingpong.Controller

Interface IGameDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameDAO
public interface IGameDAO
Interface for data access object to handle database operations for Game objects. Provides methods to save, update, check existence, and load games from the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    gameExists(String gameName)
    Checks if a game exists in the database by its name.
    Game
    loadGame(String gameName)
    Loads a game from the database by its name.
    List<String>
    loadGameNames()
    Retrieves a list of all game names stored in the database.
    Game
    loadLatestGame()
    Loads the most recently saved game from the database.

    Saves a new game into the database.

    Updates an existing game in the database.

  • Method Details

    • saveGame

      void saveGame(Game game, String gameName) throws SQLException
      Saves a new game into the database.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object to be saved.
      gameName - The name of the game for identification.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a problem executing the SQL commands.

    • updateGame

      void updateGame(Game game, String gameName) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing game in the database.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object with updated values.
      gameName - The name of the game to identify which game to update.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a problem executing the SQL commands.

    • gameExists

      boolean gameExists(String gameName) throws SQLException
      Checks if a game exists in the database by its name.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to check.
      Returns:
      true if the game exists, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a problem executing the SQL commands.

    • loadGame

      Game loadGame(String gameName) throws SQLException
      Loads a game from the database by its name.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to load.
      Returns:
      The loaded game object, or null if no game with that name exists.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a problem executing the SQL commands.

    • loadGameNames

      List<String> loadGameNames() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all game names stored in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of game names.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a problem accessing the database.

    • loadLatestGame

      Game loadLatestGame() throws SQLException
      Loads the most recently saved game from the database.
      Returns:
      The latest game object.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a problem executing the SQL commands.
